attributes.action: Stop and Reverse the RBS decision of reducing agreed mortgage facilities without consulting their customers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
RBS has taken the decision to reduce the credit limit of customer mortgages on attractive deals (e.g. Foundation), often taken out with NatWest staff advice, without notice.

In many cases these facilities were taken out after much consultation with the bank's representative and are part of extensive long term planning.
